about_the_game:
The Prologue offers a more clamped experience compared to the full version of the game. In this version, you will experience the essential knowledge about the running your own blacksmith shop on a realistic medieval castle. Don't forget to wishlist the full game to continue your ultimate blacksmith journey.



Before you start hit the anvil, talk to the king of this castle and get the necessary information for the castle.



Mine precious ores, process them and craft the most legendary weapons to meet civils & soldiers needs!



Craft legendary weapons, enchant mystical artifacts, and unlock the secrets of the forge.



The civilians and soldiers of this medieval world need a blacksmith.

Wishlist the full game "Medieval Crafter: Blacksmith" where your every swing of the hammer shapes your destiny. Explore the fantastic world, mine valuable ores, craft fabled weaponry, and become a master forger in a realistic medieval world!

name: Medieval Crafter: Blacksmith Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 with 3,1 GHz or AMD FX-8150 with 3,6 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti (2 GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon RX 460 (2 GB VRAM) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3820 with 3,6 GHz or AMD FX-8350 with 4,0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

short_description: Enter the core of craftsmanship with Medieval Crafter: Blacksmith Prologue. Discover the intriguing realm of a blacksmith, extract precious ores, create legendary weapons, and master forging in a vibrant fantasy world!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
